summary: Excel import verification testing completed successfully. All 208 deliveries from haftalik_tuketim_dataseti_urun_adli.xlsx are properly imported into AILEM MARKET (sf_musteri) account. Backend API and frontend UI both correctly display the imported data.
critical_code_review_comments: Excel import script (import_excel_consumption.py) properly maps product codes to product IDs
Delivery history endpoint limit increased from 200 to 500 to accommodate all 208 deliveries
Consumption pipeline correctly processes deliveries in chronological order
Draft generation correctly calculates suggested_qty based on MODEL B consumption calculation
Product name enrichment working correctly in both draft and delivery history views

context_for_next_testing_agent: Excel import verified. AILEM MARKET customer (sf_musteri) now has 208 deliveries covering date range 2024-01-01 to 2025-12-25. Each delivery has 9 items (Excel products). Draft shows calculated suggested_qty - 200 ML AYRAN=29, 180 ml KAKAOLU SUT 6LI=3, others=1. All consumption stats are correctly computed based on MODEL B algorithm.
